Мастер фраза для определения максимально: Well, that old thing almost tore me to pieces for its g
dialogs_chapter_7_Коельтан. Это не похож: Koeltan. This doesn't look like a jagged canyon.
dialogs_chapter_7_Мои поздравления. Тебя:
Congratulations. You've been thrown into the Dark Forest. 
This is not a pleasant place.
Excellent\..\..\.. Come on, the radio is still working.
dialogs_chapter_7_Риом? У меня тот же во: Riom? I have the same question!
dialogs_chapter_7_Мы с отрядом уже готов:
My squad and I were already preparing to walk around the area.
We thought the teleporter had thrown you somewhere towards 
the rocks\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_7_Да, я жив, здоров и за: Yeah, I'm alive and well and stuck in the Dark Forest.
dialogs_chapter_7_Та ладно, мы дружно Вл:
Oh well, we kicked Vlur-Stig's ass together, you don't have to 
worry about me.
dialogs_chapter_7_Риом, в этом месте про:
Riom, many reapers have disappeared in this place. The Dark 
Forest is little studied, and there are plenty of them like 
Vlur-Stig. Be careful.
dialogs_chapter_7_Хорошо-хорошо, постара:
Okay, okay, I'll try. Do you know how to get out of here?
Is there a teleport, lookout, or outpost nearby?
At least something.
I don't, but\..\..\.. now. Commander Ricard!
dialogs_chapter_7_Риом Рури, удача - тво:
Riom Ruri, luck is your middle name. To fly in like that.
I was afraid you'd been thrown underground, we have some 
sort of mine there. You never know, the coordinates are off.
dialogs_chapter_7_И я рад вас слышать. Р:
And I'm glad to hear from you. Ricard, jokes aside, but I'm stuck 
God knows where in the Dark Forest. The center of anomalies 
and unexplored territory.
dialogs_chapter_7_Желание отставать от о:
I have no desire to lag behind the others, so please, 
Commander, tell me where the nearest teleport is.
dialogs_chapter_7_Хм\\..\\..\\.. Риом. У: Hmm\..\..\.. Riom. I have very bad news.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ты находишься где-то в:
You are somewhere in the center of the forest. There is no 
trace of our activity within a radius of 10,000 kilometers.
dialogs_chapter_7_Максимум, что ты найде:
The most you will find are the corpses of the reapers who 
participated in the early expeditions.
dialogs_chapter_7_Едрить\\..\\..\\.. Нет:
Holy shit\..\..\.. No\..\..\.. That means I'm here for a long time. 
You won't count this as treason, will you? I should have 
destroyed Risens, with Adamant\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_7_Нет. Ты сообщил о ситу:
No. You reported the situation and it is not your fault. 
Try to get out of there on your own, or ask your ghostly 
friend. Maybe he remembers something.
dialogs_chapter_7_Мы готовимся к штурму:
We are preparing to storm the Risen base, once you have 
sorted out your problems, head to the camp under the 
highest cliff in the South, they will be waiting for you there. 
Good luck.
dialogs_chapter_7_Я что, похож на энцикл:
Do I look like an encyclopedia? These reapers really piss 
me off. I don't know any more about this place than 
you do, Riom.
dialogs_chapter_7_Получается, я и вправд: So it turns out that I am really on my own here?
dialogs_chapter_7_Не до конца. Для начал:
Not completely. First, find someone who will not try to
kill you. A guard. And he can tell you how to get into 
the Southern Canyon.
dialogs_chapter_7_Понял. Кого-то из Адам:
Got it. Do you sense any of the Adamant servants,
or the Devastators?
dialogs_chapter_7_Насчёт первых, скажу к:
As for the former, I'll tell you what I smell, but the Devastators
have no business here. So be careful with the local fauna, 
you can expect anything from them.
dialogs_chapter_7_Лаурита. Ты где находи:
Laurita. Where are you? I was thrown into the Dark Forest 
and I would like to know where exactly.
dialogs_chapter_7_Чего?! Как? Ты секунду: What?! How? You were nearby a second ago\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_7_Последний раз нога жне:
The last time a reaper set foot on the Dark Forest was 
a couple of hundred years ago. It's a terrible place, where 
we suffered losses more often and more often than in the 
jagged canyon\..\..\.. before the current Second War with Adamant.
Does that mean\..\..\.. We can't count on a teleport, observation 
point or outpost?
dialogs_chapter_7_Да. К сожалению, они в: Yes. Unfortunately, they've all been completely destroyed.
dialogs_chapter_7_Я бы отправила группу:
I would have sent a group of fighters with Kenchiru, 
the engineer, they would have come up with something, 
but you flew too far. Almost to the very center.
dialogs_chapter_7_Мы подготовим план нап:
We will prepare a plan of attack on the army of the Risen,
gather all who survived and attack as soon as everything is
ready.
dialogs_chapter_7_У тебя есть шанс выбра:
You have a chance to get out on your own.
Find the Guardian Goliath, he is the only one friendly
to us.
dialogs_chapter_7_Остальных лучше обходи: It's better to avoid the rest and please. Don't anger them!
dialogs_chapter_7_Жнец. В этих краях. С: Reaper. In these parts. With what intentions?
dialogs_chapter_7_Самыми мирными. Я сюда:
The most peaceful. I got here by accident and have no 
desire to stay for long.
dialogs_chapter_7_Мы с другими жнецами п:
We and the other reapers got to Vlur-Stig for an audience.
It quickly came down to a fight and our commander Rikard 
killed him.
dialogs_chapter_7_Я должен был телепорти:
I was supposed to teleport with the others, but something 
went wrong and I was thrown into the Dark Forest.
dialogs_chapter_7_Влур. Он исполнял посл:
Vlur. He carried out the last will of his master. And he fell
without forging a worthy blade of Paradise. The angels and 
inhabitants of Heaven are now on their own. 
The fall of our world is one step closer.
dialogs_chapter_7_Я не хотел. Он напал н: I didn't want to. He attacked us and Rickard killed him.
dialogs_chapter_7_Неважно. Ты хочешь пок:
Never mind. Do you want to leave the Dark Forest? I'll help you,
but only after mutual assistance.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ну приехали. Услуга за: Well, here we go. A favor for a favor.
dialogs_chapter_7_Недавно я получил прощ:
I have recently received forgiveness for my misdeeds before 
the Hierarchs and I can be reinstated.
dialogs_chapter_7_Без своего оружия и тр:
Without my weapon and matter transformer, I have nothing to do 
among my brothers.
dialogs_chapter_7_И ты хочешь чтобы я эт: And you want me to find it all myself.
dialogs_chapter_7_Искать не придется. То: No need to search. Just take it.
dialogs_chapter_7_На краю Темного леса,:
On the edge of the Dark Forest, where there has been strange
activity lately. I have never seen such a spiritual aura.
dialogs_chapter_7_Хорошо, только туда и:
Okay, but there and back. I'll take your staff with the
transformer and you teleport me to your base.
dialogs_chapter_7_Не горю желанием встре: I have no desire to meet the one guarding your things.
dialogs_chapter_7_Сделаю всё, что в моих: I'll do my best. Give me your tablet, I'll show you where it is.
dialogs_chapter_7_Двигай на самый край,: Move to the very edge before it gets dark.
dialogs_chapter_7_Мы с Лауритой попали н:
Laurita and I had an audience with Vlur-Stig. She
convinced him to call off his Devastators and cooperate with
Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_7_Но взамен он потребова:
But in return, he demanded that the culprit who
attacked the Devastators first be punished. It turned out to be 
Rikard, one of the most powerful reapers.
dialogs_chapter_7_Еле-еле мы с Лауритой:
Laurita and I barely managed to defeat him. Vlur kept his 
promise and helped with the teleportation.
dialogs_chapter_7_Так я и оказался здесь: That's how I ended up here.
dialogs_chapter_7_Хорошо, что вы сохрани:
It's good that you saved Vlur-Stig's life. His mission
is extremely important, he needs to finish what he started.
dialogs_chapter_7_Я помогу тебе выбратьс:
I'll help you get out, but I also need your help in
one matter.
dialogs_chapter_7_Хорошо\\..\\..\\.. И ч: Okay\..\..\.. And what do you need?
dialogs_chapter_7_Где мне искать твои ин: Where can I look for your tools?
dialogs_chapter_7_На краю Темного леса,:
At the edge of the Dark Forest, where there has been strange
activity lately. I have never seen such a spiritual aura\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_7_Как только я доберусь:
As soon as I get to it, return me to a safe
place.
dialogs_chapter_7_Не хочу оставаться оди: I don't want to be left alone with this "strange activity".
dialogs_chapter_7_Разумеется. Дай планше: Sure. Give me the tablet, I'll show you where to go.
dialogs_chapter_7_Тебе не впервые говори: Is this your first time talking to a reaper?
dialogs_chapter_7_Что это за твари летаю: What are these creatures flying around?
dialogs_chapter_7_Чем ты занимаешься как: What do you do as a guard?
dialogs_chapter_7_Слежу за тем, чтобы по:
I make sure that the Milit streams do not grow too large
 and spill out beyond the Dust Prison.
dialogs_chapter_7_Да, так я называю эту: Yes, that's what I call this area where you were thrown.
dialogs_chapter_7_Милит, в каком-то смыс:
Milit, in some sense the brother of Adamant, both minerals
produce incredibly powerful energy, both can be used for 
personal purposes.
dialogs_chapter_7_Но\\..\\..\\.. Милит л: But\..\..\.. Milit loves to create, to fill the darkness with his light.
dialogs_chapter_7_Адамант буйный сам по:
Adamant is wild in himself, his desire for destruction knows no 
bounds.
dialogs_chapter_7_Жнецы ещё не до конца:
The Reapers have not yet fully understood how to properly use
the gifts of these brothers, for which they paid.
dialogs_chapter_7_Во всем нужно сохранят:
In everything, it is necessary to maintain balance and 
proportions, if Adamant was used only as a weapon, 
and Milit for everything else, then there might not have 
been a war.
dialogs_chapter_7_Но кто будет прислушив: But who will listen to the words of a wandering outcast?
dialogs_chapter_7_Ты пробовал говорить с:
Have you tried talking to the Werolomgers on this topic?
They would have listened to you.
dialogs_chapter_7_Пробовал. И что от это:
I tried. And what changed from that? Laurita listened, 
but the others were against it.
dialogs_chapter_7_Не забивай этим голову:
Don't bother your head with this. After the first 
Adamant war, the reapers finally thought about what 
they were using and switched to a different energy source.
dialogs_chapter_7_От старых проблем изба:
We got rid of the old problems, but new ones will come 
to replace them. Milit is far from ideal and he also 
has a soul, but it is not as talkative as his brother.
dialogs_chapter_7_Тебе не впервые говори:
Is this your first time talking to a reaper? You speak as 
if you have been cooperating with us for a long time.
dialogs_chapter_7_Конечно. У Чистилища п: Of course. Purgatory has many friends in addition to enemies.
dialogs_chapter_7_Стражи одиночки, орден:
The solitary Guardians, the Order of the Devils, the 
wandering demons and, of course, the Hierarchs, the 
guardians of the Gates of Heaven.
dialogs_chapter_7_Я рассказываю Ирею обо:
I tell Irei about everything that happens in the Dark Forest.
The most dangerous enemies of the entire world of the 
Dead often hide here.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ты слышал о 12-и судья: Have you heard of the 12 judges?
dialogs_chapter_7_Да, с тенью одного даж: Yes, I even encountered the shadow of one.
dialogs_chapter_7_Он. Тот, кто питается:
He. The one who feeds on other people's fears and terrible
dreams. A nightmare.
dialogs_chapter_7_Будь осторожен Риом. Е:
Be careful, Riom. His shadows can penetrate any corner 
of the Dead world. I am sure that your failed teleportation 
is his doing.
dialogs_chapter_7_Кроме него есть кто-то: Besides him, is there anyone else\..\..\.. here?
dialogs_chapter_7_Безликий. “Он есть всё:
The Faceless One. “He is everything and nothing.” 
Fortunately, the Faceless One is locked away in an ash 
fortress far, far away from here.
dialogs_chapter_7_Интересно, у кого хват:
I wonder who had the strength to seal away a creature 
without a body or form?
We have no mention of this anywhere.
dialogs_chapter_7_О заточении Безликого:
Only one Hierarch knows about the imprisonment of the 
Faceless One, who, in alliance with the reapers, was 
able to accomplish such a feat.
dialogs_chapter_7_Нет. Этот Иерарх наход: No. This Hierarch is in Heaven, and I don't know his name.
dialogs_chapter_7_Кроме Кошмара и Безлик: Besides Nightmare and the Faceless, who else do you know?
dialogs_chapter_7_Только одного - Справе: Only one - Justice. I know nothing else about judges.
dialogs_chapter_7_Вот что бывает, когда:
This is what happens when souls mix without the control of 
laws and the Creator.
dialogs_chapter_7_На свет выходит нечто,: Something comes to light whose behavior defies logic.
dialogs_chapter_7_Пепельные бесы. Это по:
Ash demons. These are the spawn of the Abyss, the most 
harmless spawn. The souls of people, demons, and 
judging by the cloak, reapers, have united into one whole.
dialogs_chapter_7_Они явились в наш мир:
They came into our world without self-awareness and 
now they wander through the forest and do not know 
what to do. They can attack, they can freeze in place, 
or they can send you running.
dialogs_chapter_7_Мне их жаль, и ничего:
I feel sorry for them, and I can give them nothing but peace.
Like you.
dialogs_chapter_7_Белла, король велел мн:
Bella, the king ordered me and a couple hundred knights to 
prepare for a campaign against\..\..\..
We don't have much time. So what have you decided about his
name?
dialogs_chapter_7_Тай-Джиди-Рон звучит к: Tai-Gidi-Ron sounds a bit weird, how about just Ron?
dialogs_chapter_7_Люди в нашей стране ло:
People in our country break their tongues over such long 
names. It all comes down to simplification.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ладно уж\\..\\..\\.. Т: Okay then\..\..\.. I don't really like your option with Riom.
dialogs_chapter_7_М-м-м-м\\..\\..\\.. То:
Mmm-mmm\..\..\.. That doesn't work, but I don't like it, we 
need to decide what we're going to call our son.
dialogs_chapter_7_Прости\\..\\..\\.. мен:
Forgive\..\..\.. me\..\..\.. the enemies turned out to be stronger\..\..\.. Bella,
save yourself\..\..\..
Sidrin? You\..\..\.. came to see me off\..\..\.. or is this nonsense 
from a headache\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_7_Откуда ты знаешь мое и:
How do you know my name? I don't remember ever 
introducing myself to a person.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ха-ха\\..\\..\\.. Не з:
Ha-ha\..\..\.. I don't know\..\..\.. A familiar feeling, like the first time 
I saw you\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_7_Зед, у меня к тебе ест: Zed, I have a personal request for you.
dialogs_chapter_7_Она нарушает законы Чи: Does it violate the laws of Purgatory?
dialogs_chapter_7_Нет. Если что, я возьм:
No. If anything happens, I will take full responsibility and 
am ready to surrender to the punishers.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ух\\..\\..\\.. мне уже: Ugh\..\..\.. I already feel uneasy\..\..\.. and what do you want?
dialogs_chapter_7_Чтобы ты воссоздал жне:
So that you can recreate the reaper, with the habits from my
memories.
dialogs_chapter_7_Женщина и твоя любовь:
The woman and your love on the other side. All you 
remember is that dying piece.
Okay, the habits are fine, but you will mold the full 
personality out of it yourself.
dialogs_chapter_7_Что за\\..\\..\\.. Оте:
What the\..\..\.. Father said that he met Mom in the world of 
the Living and turned her into a reaper, preserving all her 
memories.
dialogs_chapter_7_Как видишь, это правда: As you can see, it's true. He didn't give all the details, did he?
dialogs_chapter_7_Нет. Откуда это здесь?:
No. Where did this come from? Not only are these 
fragments of memories fragmented, but they're also from 
different times.
dialogs_chapter_7_У этого места хорошая:
This place has a good memory. Almost all reapers 
have a glimmer of a soul. It's like a fingerprint.
dialogs_chapter_7_Поступки прошлой жизни:
The actions of a past life haunt the reaper, and even after a complete 
cleansing, the memory will return in pieces, and all thanks to 
a glimmer, short memories from life.
dialogs_chapter_7_Может из-за этого жнец:
Maybe that's why the reapers don't come here. If everyone in
Purgatory remembered who they were in life and what they did\..\..\..
imagine the chaos that would begin.
dialogs_chapter_7_Поэтому Смерть огранич:
Therefore, Death limited the development of personality 
in the reapers.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ага, чтобы неудобные м:
Yeah, so that uncomfortable thoughts don't start creeping 
into their head, but she won't be able to do anything about the
reflections. This bitch is more afraid of losing control over her 
system than of the arrival of the Second Cataclysm.
dialogs_chapter_7_Проехали. Не хочу об э:
Let's move on. I don't want to think about it now. For now, she 
has nothing to be afraid of.
dialogs_chapter_7_Так-так-так. Давно у м: Well, well, well. I haven't had guests in a long time.
dialogs_chapter_7_Я ношу имя, которые вы:
I bear the name you gave me - Nightmare. But who 
I am is not so important.
dialogs_chapter_7_Важнее то, кто ты тако:
What is important is who you are and what you are doing 
here.
dialogs_chapter_7_Мне нужно выбраться из:
I need to get out of the Dark Forest, and I can't do it without 
Goliath's help. Judging by the traces of spiritual energy,
he was here. What happened to him?
dialogs_chapter_7_Он тут мимо проходил,:
He was passing by, asking questions, too, and as you can see\..\..\..
He got answers.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ублюдок. Голиаф единст:
Bastard. Goliath was the only one in this damned place who
wanted to help me.
dialogs_chapter_7_Правда? И что ты намер: Really? And what are you going to do?
dialogs_chapter_7_Давай, ударь меня. Пус:
Go ahead, strike me. Let the edge of your blade tear my flesh 
apart, and let my entrails and blood paint the field around us!
dialogs_chapter_7_Как было со всеми, кто: As it was with everyone who stood in your way.
Since you asked for it yourself\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_7_По Кошмару удар проход: The blow passes right through the Nightmare.
dialogs_chapter_7_Кошмар в последних миг:
Nightmare managed to intercept the blade between his claws at 
the last moment.
dialogs_chapter_7_Рана благодаря регенер: The wound began to heal quickly thanks to regeneration.
dialogs_chapter_7_Моя очередь задавать в: It's my turn to ask questions. Are you an enemy or a friend?
dialogs_chapter_7_Первое означает, что п:
The first means that you have come for my soul, with the 
purpose of revenge for the fact that I killed Goliath and Death 
in her best years.
dialogs_chapter_7_В таком случае я тебя:
In that case, I will gut you, without a trace. And you, like
Goliath, will get what you came for - freedom.
dialogs_chapter_7_Во втором случае, ты с:
In the second case, you will keep me company, amuse me
in the game and I, as a good friend, will help you get out of
the Dark Forest.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ты вернешься к своим д:
You will return to your friends and together, amicably, you will go
to exterminate the surrounding fauna for the good of Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_7_Хорошо, тогда раз мы д: Okay, then since we are friends, let's play.
dialogs_chapter_7_Кошмар коснулся кончик: Nightmare touched the point between the eyes with the tip of the blade.
dialogs_chapter_7_Так кто ты? Друг или в: So who are you? Friend or enemy?
dialogs_chapter_7_Мама? Отец? Что вы зде:
Mom? Dad? What are you doing here? Aren't you supposed 
to be in Purgatory? Where am I?
Calm down, son\..\..\.. You hit your head hard.
dialogs_chapter_7_О каком Чистилище речь:
What Purgatory are you talking about? And what do you mean 
"we're supposed to be there"?
dialogs_chapter_7_Что за хрень здесь тво: What the hell is going on here?!
dialogs_chapter_7_Риом Рури, как ваше са: Riom Ruri, how are you feeling?
dialogs_chapter_7_Кто ты такой?! Это всё: Who are you?! This is all fake! Let me out!
dialogs_chapter_7_Простите, доктор Гросс:
Sorry, Dr. Grossman. He was literally a normal person 
yesterday, and now\..\..\.. it's like his memory has been 
knocked out.
dialogs_chapter_7_Риом, ты помнишь нас с: Riom, do you remember me and your mother?
dialogs_chapter_7_Всё хорошо, Риом, от у:
It's okay, Riom, it happens from hitting your head after 
falling down the stairs. Patients don't recognize their 
loved ones, they talk all sorts of nonsense.
dialogs_chapter_7_В нашей клинике вас бы: In our clinic you will be cured quickly.
dialogs_chapter_7_Позвольте забрать ваше:
Let me take your son to a rehabilitation course.
Exactly 4 days and he will be as good as new. 
If he gets better sooner, we will discharge him sooner.
dialogs_chapter_7_То есть сейчас не прид: I mean he's not coming now.
dialogs_chapter_7_Очередные бредни. Он г:
More nonsense. He's talking to his imaginary
friend, or something like that.
dialogs_chapter_7_Белла от стыда закрыла: Bella covered her face with her hands in shame.
dialogs_chapter_7_Я убью тебя, кем бы ты: I'll kill you, whoever you are, you bastard.
dialogs_chapter_7_Простите, доктор, он я: Sorry, Doctor, he's clearly not himself.
dialogs_chapter_7_Помогите ему, верните:
Help him, give us back our former son, we will sign all the 
documents.
dialogs_chapter_7_Сестра, увезите его в: Nurse, take him to the ward!
dialogs_chapter_7_Ага. Здесь и здесь под: Yeah. Sign here and here. Now Bella.
dialogs_chapter_7_Я вас всех на куски ра: I'll tear you all to pieces, the devil's under-illusions\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_7_Медсестра оказалась на:
The nurse was so strong that she almost broke Riom's throat 
with her blow.
dialogs_chapter_7_Завались. Тебе до него: Shut up. You're far from him.
dialogs_chapter_7_Риом от нехватки возду: Riom lost consciousness from lack of air.
dialogs_chapter_7_Пролетев 4 этажа, койк:
Having flown 4 floors, the bed was shattered into pieces, 
and Riom flew out of it.
dialogs_chapter_7_Сер, прошу вас, покинь:
Sir, please leave the building, otherwise the staff will 
throw you out feet first and you will have to deal with the 
police!
dialogs_chapter_7_Да чё ты\\..\\..\\.. Р: Oh, come on\..\..\.. Relax. I've done my job.
dialogs_chapter_7_Опа-на, мелкий, как ты:
Oops, little one, how are you, okay? Find me and we'll talk! 
Hurry, don't forget!
dialogs_chapter_7_Вон из здания! На выхо: Get out of the building! Get out!
dialogs_chapter_7_Риом пытается нащупать: Riom tries to feel for the sword. But it's not there.
dialogs_chapter_7_Медсестра Розалия, спу:
Nurse Rosalia, go down to the 1st floor, your patient is 
here.
dialogs_chapter_7_Нет, уж так легко я не:
No, I won't give in that easily. How did Rita almost knock 
out Gasp?..
dialogs_chapter_7_Риом с разбегу ударил: Riom ran and kicked the guard in the groin area.
dialogs_chapter_7_Что за хрень тут проис:
What the hell is going on here?! I don't understand 
anything. Some kind of hospital, my parents don't know 
about Purgatory\..\..\.. and you. Who are you?
dialogs_chapter_7_Ты меня не знаешь. Даж:
You don't know me. Even if I tell you my name. 
But I know our mutual friend.
dialogs_chapter_7_Та пей, не ссы. Это кр:
Drink it, don't piss yourself. It's strong green tea, good for your 
nerves.
Riom drank it all in one gulp.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ну ты и алкаш, мне бы:
What a drunkard you are, you could have left me at least a 
quarter.
dialogs_chapter_7_Запах тот же, что я сл:
The smell is the same as what I smelled when I talked to 
Koeltan.
That's what I was talking about.
dialogs_chapter_7_Знаешь меня, Коельтана:
You know me, Koeltan. Are you a part of the soul of the 
former owner of Genom Morkret? Or who?
dialogs_chapter_7_Почаще заглядывай на к: Come to Koel's fire more often and you'll find out.
dialogs_chapter_7_А сейчас время полетат: And now it's time to fly.
dialogs_chapter_7_Спасибо за чай. Он усп:
Thank you for the tea. It calms me down, but there are still
no fewer questions.
dialogs_chapter_7_А вот и ты. Хоть кто-т: Here you are. At least someone can explain everything to me.
dialogs_chapter_7_Мои способности жнеца:
My reaper abilities remain intact. Koeltan's Shadow Step still 
works. Now, friend, it's time for you and me to have a private 
talk.
dialogs_chapter_7_Риом вернул всё своё с: Riom got all his gear back.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ну что Кошмар, твоя иг: Well, Nightmare, your mind game is coming to an end.
dialogs_chapter_7_Стой. Лучше молчи. Я у:
Stop. Better keep quiet. I already realized that this world 
is not real and your illusions are even more fragile than the 
defense of Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_7_О чём ты? И что это за:
What are you talking about? And what is that outfit 
you're wearing? Are you trying to cosplay?
dialogs_chapter_7_У меня такие же вопрос: I have the same questions for all of you.
dialogs_chapter_7_Говорите, что у меня н:
You say I'm nuts. You look like everyone I know, just in 
different clothes. Bad joke, Nightmare.
dialogs_chapter_7_Вот блин\\..\\..\\.. А:
Oh, man\..\..\.. We were planning to go to a cafe today to 
celebrate our anniversary\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_7_Эм-м\\..\\..\\.. Н-нет:
Um\..\..\.. N-no\..\..\.. We've only been dating for a year. 
It's a bit early, but if that's what you're thinking about, 
I'm ready\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_7_Стой-стой-стой! Мы кон:
Stop-stop-stop! We've certainly been through a lot 
together, but let's deal with the Risen first.
dialogs_chapter_7_(Стоп. Зачем я вообще:
(Stop. Why am I even talking to an illusion? 
Rita is a cutie, but the setting has never been romantic. 
Why am I bringing this up now?)
dialogs_chapter_7_Какая ещё война? Ох, Р:
What war? Oh, Riomushka, you should take a break 
from your work for at least a few days. You can't live in 
fantasies forever, manga and scripts won't get far from you.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ты один из креативных:
You are one of the creative directors of a studio that 
produces anime and develops games.
dialogs_chapter_7_Слушай, Рита. Я не сум:
Listen, Rita. I'm not crazy. I don't know what happened 
between us, but you and I will get back to it. 
Just let me sort out my problems.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ты это постоянно говор:
You say that all the time, and then you disappear for weeks.
You don't even find time for your girlfriend. I don't demand 
mountains of gold from you, just\..\..\.. don't forget me.
dialogs_chapter_7_А если я тебе неинтере: And if you're not interested in me\..\..\.. then just say so.
dialogs_chapter_7_Прости. За всё. Меня ж:
Sorry. For everything. I have a very important test 
ahead of me. As soon as I deal with it, I promise, 
I'm all yours. Agreed?
dialogs_chapter_7_Угу. Только поскорее,: Yeah. Just hurry up, I can't wait for you forever\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_7_Рита подтянула Риома к:
Rita pulled Riom towards her and kissed him tenderly on 
the lips. Riom gave in and hugged the girl tightly.
dialogs_chapter_7_Риом обнаружил в руке: Riom found a lock of yellow hair in his hand.
dialogs_chapter_7_Риом. Тебя уже выписыв:
Riom. Are you being discharged yet? Does your head hurt 
anymore?
dialogs_chapter_7_Выписываюсь, но без оф:
I'm being discharged, but without official permission and 
everything was fine with my head.
Listen, Laurita\..\..\.. there is one very important matter waiting 
for me on the other side. As soon as I deal with it, I will 
return to you.
dialogs_chapter_7_Уходишь, а с женой даж:
You leave, and you don't even want to say goodbye to your 
wife with a kiss.
dialogs_chapter_7_Женой?! Когда мы успел: Wife?! When did we manage to\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_7_Всё же удар по головуш: Still, the blow to the head was strong.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ну, память ещё успеет: Well, the memory will still have time to return.
dialogs_chapter_7_И чем я занимался до\\: And what did I do before\..\..\.. losing my memory?
dialogs_chapter_7_Ты главный директор кн:
You're the head of a book cafe, and on weekends you work 
part-time as a stuntman in films.
dialogs_chapter_7_Кстати, костюмчик ниче: By the way, your suit is pretty cool.
dialogs_chapter_7_В каком фильме на этот: What film are you going to star in this time?
dialogs_chapter_7_В фэнтезятине с мистик:
In a fantasy with mysticism. I see. With this I can only wish
success.
dialogs_chapter_7_Лаурита подтянула Риом:
Laurita pulled Riom to her and kissed him tenderly on the lips.
Riom gave in and pressed the girl tightly to himself.
dialogs_chapter_7_(полушепотом) И ещё у: (in a half-whisper) And I have another surprise for you.
dialogs_chapter_7_Лаурита взяла Риома за: Laurita took Riom's hand and placed it on her stomach.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ещё пару месяцев ждать: A couple more months to wait.
dialogs_chapter_7_Риом обнаружил в руке: Riom found a lock of black hair in his hand.
dialogs_chapter_7_Риом\\..\\..\\.. Где т: Riom\..\..\.. Where have you been? It's too late.
dialogs_chapter_7_Последний отряд развед: The last scout squad was killed in the Southern Canyon.
dialogs_chapter_7_Отец приказал стоять д: Father ordered us to stand to the last and\..\..\.. I was the last one.
dialogs_chapter_7_Здаров, ублюдина. Долг:
Hello, you bastard. You've been missing for a long time. 
Without you, we fought the Risen for a week, day after day, 
but it was all in vain.
Rose fought the two leaders with all her might\..\..\.. Rose\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_7_Жаль, что я тебя тогда:
It's a pity that I didn't kill you then along with Rita. 
I knew that you, like me, can only swing a sword. 
Think with your head and make decisions\..\..\.. 
No, that's not about you.
dialogs_chapter_7_Прости. Я слаба и могу:
I'm sorry. I'm weak and can only support others.
I'm sorry. Forgive me.
Thank you for everything\..\..\.. It hurts. It hurts because I like 
Kenchiru more than you.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ты исчез из моей жизни:
You disappeared from my life like a ghost. And your friend 
was there for me until the very end.
I wanted to be with you. To feel the happiness that is 
granted to mortals. No confession, no kiss, not even 
time to fuck.
dialogs_chapter_7_Риом. Наконец-то. Так:
Riom. Finally. It's been so long since we've seen each 
other. I missed you and waited, but alas, my warriors 
couldn't wait forever, and neither could my enemies.
dialogs_chapter_7_Восставшие перебили вс:
Risens killed everyone, reached Purgatory and
destroyed everything to the roots.
dialogs_chapter_7_Спасибо тебе за всё, з:
Thank you for everything, for that night at the bottom of 
the lake, for your help, your support.
dialogs_chapter_7_Я поверила, что теперь:
I believed that now there would be no discord between us, 
the reapers of all the corps had finally united.
dialogs_chapter_7_Жаль, что больше всего: It's a pity that I believed in you the most.
dialogs_chapter_7_Риом Рури, сын Высшего:
Riom Ruri, the son of the High Reaper, left us at the most 
crucial moment.
dialogs_chapter_7_Надеюсь, твоя душа до:
I hope your soul will pass through all the circles of Hell 
before being sent to the Abyss. That's where you belong.
dialogs_chapter_7_Восставшим это будешь: You will tell this to Risens. When you return home.
dialogs_chapter_7_Они словно из ниоткуда:
They appeared in the city out of nowhere and destroyed 
the barrier from within.
dialogs_chapter_7_Добрались и до нашего: They got to our house too.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ты знал, что мать не о: Did you know that mother isn't very good at fighting\..\..\.. killing?
dialogs_chapter_7_Ты моя самая великая г: You are my greatest pride, love and\..\..\.. worst mistake.
dialogs_chapter_7_Не стоило тебя выводит:
You shouldn't have been brought into the light. It would have 
been better to ask Death for power, so that you could have 
dealt with Adamant's servants yourself.
dialogs_chapter_7_Кошмар, сука, покажись:
Nightmare, bitch, show yourself!! Stop hiding behind illusions!
You want to piss me off?! I'm ready! 
Come on, miscarriage of the Abyss!
dialogs_chapter_7_Как тебе моё представл: How did you like my performance?
dialogs_chapter_7_Ты хотел разозлить мен:
You wanted to piss me off. You did it. Well done.
I hope you're ready to enjoy the result?
dialogs_chapter_7_Каким бы сильным, духо:
No matter how strong, spiritually indestructible a reaper 
you are\..\..\.. you have a human heart.
dialogs_chapter_7_Риом. Твой отец сделал:
Riom. Your father gave us the most generous gift when 
he asked Death to create a reaper with a full mortal soul.
dialogs_chapter_7_Знаешь чего Смерть боя:
Do you know what Death feared most when he heard 
this request?
dialogs_chapter_7_Ты станешь одним из на: You will become one of us. The damned one.
You won't live to see it.
dialogs_chapter_7_Как раз дождусь. Время:
I'll actually wait. Time is the main component in the 
process of transformation.
dialogs_chapter_7_Знаешь почему только т:
Do you know why only you are suitable for the role of the 
owner of Genom Morkret?
dialogs_chapter_7_Та же причина, что и с: The same reason as with the fear of Death.
dialogs_chapter_7_Да. Но не в этом вопро:
Yes. But that's not the question. The High Reapers 
themselves eventually became human-like, but none of 
them could master the Genom.
dialogs_chapter_7_Вероломгеры? Я думал м:
Werolomgers? I thought only the Punishers tried to wield the 
sword.
dialogs_chapter_7_Их попытки не дошли и: Their attempts did not reach your level.
dialogs_chapter_7_Значит все Вероломгеры:
So all the Werolomgers reached the form of release and
fell back.
dialogs_chapter_7_Верно, но у тебя есть:
True, but you have a chance to reach the top and survive.
Because only a human can understand Koeltan, his
history, thoughts, feelings, how he kills, why.
Every little thing.
dialogs_chapter_7_А без этих мелочей ник:
And without these little things there is no way, because 
liberation is absolute. All the details are needed.
dialogs_chapter_7_Зачем ты все это расск:
Why are you telling all this? I don't give a shit who you are,
what kind of abyss creatures you are. I came here to\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_7_Я мог бы тебя выкинуть:
I could throw you back into the canyon, but you 
missed that moment somewhere at the beginning. 
Hee-hee-hee\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_7_Тот кто предложил тебе:
The one who offered you help is dead, and I see you 
as an enemy and I don't intend to let you go.
dialogs_chapter_7_Упасть на колени и отч: Fall to your knees and despair.
dialogs_chapter_7_Чистилище. Это Риом Ру: Purgatory. This is Riom Ruri, answer.
dialogs_chapter_7_Сообщите Сидрину срочн:
Inform Sidrin immediately. I have found one of the 12 judges,
Nightmare.
dialogs_chapter_7_Конечно Риом, мы перед:
Of course Riom, we will pass on to your father any
information you give.
dialogs_chapter_7_Продолжайте развлекать:
Continue to entertain Judge Nightmare, his laughter is your
well-being. Weiler has already tried, his fate is unenviable.
All the best, do not be distracted from the conversation.
dialogs_chapter_7_Какие ещё варианты на: What other options are on your mind?
dialogs_chapter_7_По пути сюда я одолел:
On the way here I defeated everyone who was confident 
of their victory and advantage over me.
dialogs_chapter_7_Чем ты лучше их?: How are you better than them?
dialogs_chapter_7_Поразительно\\..\\..\\:
It's amazing\..\..\.. In those few hours that you spent in your 
own head, you didn't understand anything.
dialogs_chapter_7_Нет, Риом, ты не умреш:
No, Riom, you will not die here. I will take you alive, 
turn you into my slave, show you to the rest of my\..\..\.. 
colleagues, and turn you into the damned.
dialogs_chapter_7_Такого дурака в нашем:
There has never been such a fool in our world and there 
never will be. Such courage and self-confidence exist only 
in people.
Finally\..\..\.. Your sword has finally reached me.
dialogs_chapter_7_Уверен? Как раз тебе х: Are you sure? Just enough for you.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ты труп. Твоё имя узна:
You are a corpse. Your name will be known to every 
inhabitant of the Abyss, to every creature on the other 
side of existence.
dialogs_chapter_7_\\>ЧТОБ ТВОЙ КИШКИ СГН: \>MAY YOUR GUTS ROT ALONG WITH YOUR PIECE OF BRAIN.\|\^
dialogs_chapter_7_\\>ЖАЛКИЙ ГОВНЮК, Я ВЫ:
\>PATHETIC BASTARD, I WILL RIP OUT YOUR HEART 
THROUGH YOUR TONSILS, \>RIPE OFF YOUR SKIN, 
CRUSH EVERY BONE.\|\^
dialogs_chapter_7_\\>ТЫ ЗАХЛЕБНЕШЬСЯ В С: \>YOU WILL DROWN IN YOUR OWN BLOOD AND PISS.\|\^
dialogs_chapter_7_\\>НЕТ МЕСТА В МИРЕ МЕ:
\>THERE IS NO PLACE IN THE WORLD OF THE DEAD 
WHERE WE CAN'T REACH YOU.\|\^
dialogs_chapter_7_\\>КАЖДЫЙ МИГ НА ЗЕМЛЕ:
\>EVERY MOMENT ON EARTH WILL BE LIKE A HELL'S 
AGONY!\|\^
dialogs_chapter_7_\\>ТЫ ЗДОХНЕШЬ! ЗДОХНЕ:
\>YOU WILL DIE! YOU WILL DIE! YOU WILL DIE! YOU WILL DIE!
YOU WILL DIE! YOU WILL DIE! YOU WILL DIE! YOU WILL DIE!
YOU WILL DIE! YOU WILL DIE!\|\^
dialogs_chapter_7_Я сдаюсь вам. Делай со: I surrender to you. Do with me whatever you want.
Indeed\..\..\.. Battles, service to Death\..\..\.. Reapers protect human 
souls from monsters like you\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_7_А мы по факту ведем во:
And in fact we are waging a war on several fronts. 
I've had enough.
dialogs_chapter_7_В награду за проделанн:
As a reward for the path you have taken, you will live in 
a wonderful world, you will forget everything. Who you are. 
What was, what awaited you, and the whole world 
around you.
dialogs_chapter_7_Твой разум обретет пок:
Your mind will find peace. Your soul will belong to the Abyss.
And your body will be subject to the curse.
dialogs_chapter_7_И Даркус Морде пополни:
And Darkus Morde will join our ranks, and you will not 
become his next victim.
dialogs_chapter_7_Кошмар кончиком когтя: Nightmare lifted Riom's chin with the tip of his claw.
dialogs_chapter_7_За тем коснулся центра: Then he touched the center point between his eyes.
dialogs_chapter_7_Вечного тебе сна, Риом: Eternal sleep to you, Riom Ruri, reaper with a human heart.
dialogs_chapter_7_О! З добрым утром, Рио: Oh! Good morning, Riom. How are you feeling?
dialogs_chapter_7_Лучше, чем когда-либо: Better than ever in my life.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ого\\..\\..\\.. А с ви: Wow\..\..\.. It doesn't look like it.
dialogs_chapter_7_Риом, вы готовы к фина:
Riom, are you ready for your final check-up? The results of the 
course are positive and we are ready to discharge you today.
dialogs_chapter_7_Розалия, палата 24, ко: Rosalia, room 24, cognitive test. Patient ready.
No need. I'll do it myself.
dialogs_chapter_7_Когда тебя выпишут вер:
When you are discharged, will you return to your old job or 
will you do something else?
dialogs_chapter_7_Снова ты по борделям ш: You were hanging around the brothels again!
dialogs_chapter_7_Прости\\..\\..\\.. Я б:
Sorry\..\..\.. I was drunk\..\..\.. I got carried away while partying, the 
count insisted. But, I didn't use the services of courtesans.
dialogs_chapter_7_Ты это и в прошлый раз:
You said the same thing last time! So you don't need me\..\..\..
I get it.
dialogs_chapter_7_Стой! Рита, не уходи!: Stop! Rita, don't go! I'm really sorry!
dialogs_chapter_7_Нет уж. Разберись со с:
No way. Sort out your desires, and then maybe
we'll talk\..\..\.. sometime.
dialogs_chapter_7_Нет\\..\\..\\.. зайди: No\..\..\.. come inside, let's talk calmly.
dialogs_chapter_7_Рита ударила со всей с: Rita hit Taiji in the groin with all her might.
dialogs_chapter_7_Тайджи упал и в агонии: Taiji fell and is trying to get back on his feet in agony.
dialogs_chapter_7_Век тебя знать не хочу:
I don't want to know you ever again!! Don't come near me 
anymore!!
dialogs_chapter_7_Риом. Успокойся, у теб: Riom. Calm down, your heart has suddenly sped up.
dialogs_chapter_7_Почему он на меня похо: Why does he look like me?
dialogs_chapter_7_Его зовут Тайджи\\..\\: His name is Taiji\..\..\.. A familiar name.
dialogs_chapter_7_Это отблеск души Риты:
This is a reflection of Rita's soul and some other reaper. 
Everything that was there in life remains there. 
She has nothing in common with the current Rita.
dialogs_chapter_7_Её привычки бить в пах:
Her habits of hitting in the groin\..\..\.. Impulsiveness\..\..\.. 
She hasn't gone far from herself in life.
dialogs_chapter_7_Вернуть шар на стартов: Return the ball to the starting point?
dialogs_chapter_7_Спасибо, за то что про:
Thank you for playing through another episode of Riom Ruri's story!
Episode 8 is currently in development.
As soon as it's released, teleport to "Scout Outpost" again.
